serverInfo.name: SemanticKernel-PersonalMemory
serverInfo.title: Semantic Kernel Personal Memory
serverInfo.description: Let assistants save, delete, search, list, and query a user's personal memories securely using KernelMemory and OAuth context.

instructions: Use 0 relevance by default. Only use higher relevance when needed and never go beyond 0.6, since that will almost never return anything.
